src:
MOZZART TV - TIKET ZA VIKEND: Da li su Peđine dojave prave?
Gost naše Jovane Strinić je glumac Petar Milićević, koga poznajete po ulozi Peđe u Ekipizzi

07 Nov 2019

Peđa uvek ima dojave s lica mesta, Peđa je bio na pragu poziva za reprezentaciju za Svetsko prvenstvo 2010. godine, Peđa je bio na probi u Juventusu…
Mnogi misle da Peđa laže, ali šta je prava istina?
Odgovor je pokušala da pronađe naša Jovana Strinić, koja je u Tiketu za vikend ugostila Petra Milićevića, koji tumači ulogu Peđe u Ekipizzi, seriji čiju novu epizodu možete da pogledate večeras od 22.00. I nije je razočarao: sastavio je tiket koji će mu, ako prođe, doneti višemilionski dobitak.
Pogledajte i sami…
text:
MOZZART TV - WEEKEND TICKET: Are Pede's Alerts Right?
The guest of our Jovana Strinic is actor Petar Milicevic, whom you know for his role as Pedja in the Ekipizzi

07 Nov 2019

Pedja always has reports from the spot, Pedja was on the verge of calling for the 2010 World Cup team, Pedja was in rehearsal in Juventus…
Many people think that Pedja is lying, but what is the real truth?
The answer was tried to find our Jovana Strinic, who hosted Petar Milicevic in the Ticket at the weekend, who interprets the role of Pedja in Ekipizzi, a series whose new episode you can watch tonight from 10pm. And he didn't disappoint her: he put together a ticket that, if passed, would bring him millions of profits.
See for yourself…
